column5: There was a post here a few weeks ago about Lake Athabasca and Lakers Unlimited, I believe by Atlanta Dave. I can't seem to find the original post. I'm looking for anyone who has been to this place and can give me some details (time of year, accomodations, guides, etc.) I'm actually most interested in pike fishing, but it sounds like it's a good place for multiple species. Any info. is appreciated along with email address so I can contact you. Thanks. Rick W.[email protected]
Rick Email me and I can tell you all about Lakers. Have been going there for 5 years.[email protected] Atlanta Dave
I can't seem to get my email to go through to you. Can you email me at [email protected]?

Hey Rick, There is an interesting article on pike fishing at Lakers Unlimited in the latest issue of Esox Angler. I have been to Lakers a few times geat place, people and fishing. I when primarily for the big lake trout at the Johnson island lodge. If your after pike the Spring bay location is probably the place to be. Mpls Dave
Rick I sent you an email Atlanta Dave
Rick Did you get a date with Lakers and if you did what week. Atlanta dave
I just got a brochure from lakers for a 05 trip and they are going up $300.00 in 05 to $2700.oo per week.
pikenut Was well aware have reservation for June 05. Thanks for the thought Atlanta Dave
